name: HerbRecon
tagline: A tool for Czech herb learners, designed to help them to develop their herb recognition skill.
body: Vítejte na domovských stránkách plánovaného projektu HerbRecon. Více informací lze prozatím nalézt v [repozitáři projektu](https://github.com/StudentToolsGroup/HerbRecon).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
